title: Fragment, 500–1200
medium:
Medium: Wool
Technique: Chain stitch on plain weave.
description: Fragment of a larger fabric patterned by small standing figures holding sticks - two rows each of four figures.  Selvedge at left side and bottom remaining.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 500–1200.
500–1200. Medium: Wool
Technique: Chain stitch on plain weave.. Bequest of Marian Hague. 1971-50-9.
